content.raw:
I will resolve the merge conflict, remove the dtype workaround and merge this on Monday if there are no comments/offers to test.

The only changes are `b''` prefixes, `unicode_literals`, and `str = unicode`, so any bugs where we've missed one of these will be trivial to fix.

I will resolve the merge conflict, remove the dtype workaround and merge this on Monday if there are no comments/offers to test.

The only changes are b'' prefixes, unicode_literals, and str = unicode, so any bugs where we've missed one of these will be trivial to fix.
